game.name: CUPRUM2929
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: After waking up disoriented near the sea, a young kid must navigate through an enigmatic city controlled by AI screens, searching for their missing dog, Pythagora. Solve intricate puzzles housed in unique locations and unravel the secrets of this advanced island and reunite with your companion.
game.shortDescriptionEn: After waking up disoriented near the sea, a young kid must navigate through an enigmatic city controlled by AI screens, searching for their missing dog, Pythagora. Solve intricate puzzles housed in unique locations and unravel the secrets of this advanced island and reunite with your companion.
